articles.title: 4 Mass. State Police troopers charged in death of recruit suspended with pay
articles.description:
The supervisor and three full-time instructors facing manslaughter charges were suspended with pay following duty status hearings.

The post 4 Mass. State Police troopers charged in death of recruit suspended with pay appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Four Massachusetts State Police troopers charged with manslaughter in recruit's death.
Troopers, including a supervisor, suspended with pay after duty status hearings.
Charges raise concerns about police training practices and accountability in Boston.

articles.title: Police in Idaho search for suspect who stole ambulance, drove into building that houses DHS offices

articles.title: Man faces felony assault charges after string of random sexual attacks in and around Malden T station
articles.description:
